page.title: 18EDUCATION IN RADSTOCK.
page.content: Before children are five they can go to playgroups and then start at infant school at five.They then go to junior school followed at eleven by secondary school.If they wish they can go to technical college at sixteen. Our school is st Nicholas Junior School.We open at nine o'clock preceded by ten minutes playtime.At ten twenty we have an assembly then ten minutes play time.We have dinner at twelve o'clock until one o'clock.Another play time at two o'clock and we finish at five past three.In school we study Mathematics, English language and do projects. These have included"The Civil War"and the"Human Body".We have eight teachers and a headmaster.After school we have many clubs including football,netball, cricket,horse riding,choir and cookery.
